title: DungeonsXL插件如何讓背包、等級同步？金粒不手軟！！
author: kenandthe985
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kenandthe985 于 2018-9-6 13:29 编辑 

我使用DungeonsXL插件
多重世界是Multiverse插件
示范影片

只要进入ˋDungeonsXL副本，等级和身上装备就会消失不见，一直到副本结束出来才会还
表示背包和等级都无法同步，请问腐竹们要如何设定，才能把两个世界的背包和等级同步？
若我提供的资讯不完善
请告诉我还要补上什麽东西
谢谢
以下是我的ˋDungeonsXL Config 配置文件：
 configVersion: 16language: Chinese
enableEconomy: false
chatEnabled: true
chatFormat:
  edit: '&2[Edit] &r%player_name%: '
  game: '&2[Game] %group_color%%player_name%: &r'
  group: '&2%group_color%[%group_name%] %player_name%: &r'
  spy: '&2[Chat Spy] %player_name%: &r'
tutorial:
  activated: true
  dungeon: food1
  startGroup: Builder
  endgroup: Builder
groupColorPriority:
- DARK_BLUE
- LIGHT_RED
- YELLOW
- LIGHT_GREEN
- PURPLE
- ORANGE
- WHITE
- BLACK
- LIGHT_BLUE
- DARK_GREEN
- DARK_RED
- LIGHT_GRAY
- CYAN
- MAGENTA
- DARK_GRAY
announcementInterval: 30.0
sendFloorTitle: true
globalDeathMessagesDisabled: true
externalMobProviders: {}
resourcePacks: {}
maxInstances: 10
secureMode:
  enabled: true
  openInventories: true
  dropItems: false
  checkInterval: 5.0
  editCommandWhitelist:
   - help
   - login
   - l
backupMode: ON_DISABLE_AND_SAVE
editPermissions: []
default: {}

replies.author: xxfk
replies.txt_content:
default:
  keepInventoryOnEnter: true
  keepInventoryOnFinish: true
  keepInventoryOnEscape: true
